title: Drawing, "Study for a Portrait of Albert Gallatin Seated, with Study of Miss. Litchfield's Right Hand, verso", 1897–99
medium: Graphite on gray-green wove paper with white heightening on verso
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite at lower right: for Albert Gallatin/1899; 
Verso: Minniwaska/Aug 2 97/for portrait of Miss Litchfield
description:
Recto:Man with head turned to the left is seated at a table with his arm resting on papers.
Verso: Study of a woman's right hand

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for a Portrait of Albert Gallatin Seated, with Study of Miss. Litchfield's Right Hand, verso", 1897–99.
1897–99. Graphite on gray-green wove paper with white heightening on verso. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1043.
